definitions.definition: A healthy and vigorous-rooted plant that is used in grafting , most commonly as a sound base to support a scion that bears desirable fruit in orchard culture .
The necessary basis for something to develop .

main_definition: ( agriculture ) A healthy and vigorous-rooted plant that is used in grafting , most commonly as a sound base to support a scion that bears desirable fruit in orchard culture .
secondary_definitions: ( figurative , by extension ) The necessary basis for something to develop .
